item.title: How to Create and Run Cron Jobs in Node
item.description: You ever want to automate certain tasks on your app, saving you the hustle of doing them manually such as deletion of log files, automated emails or maybe doing a backup of your database data into a MongoDB/SQL dump file, well say no more cron jobs are here to help. What is a cronjob? A cron job is a task that automatically runs on a set schedule, example at 0000h you might have a cron job clear site cache on your CDN(Content Delivery Network).
